name: WMP-C
short_description:
This program allows you to easily control a video in the primary monitor while viewing it full-screen in a second monitor and an optional third monitor.
Functions include:
Play, Pause, Stop, Fast-Forward, Re-Wind, Skip Backwards, Skip Forwards, Open and Close 2/3 monitors.
You can open a file from within the player or by dragging and dropping the file onto the program executable.

If you have any questions, or suggestions please leave a comment.
summary: Easily control videos displayed on 2nd and 3rd monitors
